name: awaiting feedback
description: Awaiting a response from a customer. Will be automatically closed after approximately 2 weeks.

name: duplicate
description: Closed as feature/bug is a duplicate

name: wontfix
description: This is not something we plan to implement

name: backlog
description: We hope to fix this feature/bug in the future

name: scheduled
description: Work is starting on this feature/bug

name: released
description: This feature/bug fix has been released
